attributes.action: give granparents who are raiseing granchildren a allowence equal to foster parents,
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
i have had my grandson for 5 years as his mother is a drug addict,for the first year i maintained the child my self money ran short and i had to claim state benifit we live from hand to mouth
he now has a very stable and safe life but i am now limited to the life i should be laeding due to the fact i now care for him.my own kids have left home
with familys of their own.my daughter has been in and out of prison shows very little intrest in her son even missing his birthdays,she has a soicial worker who makes sure she is ok and in good health and my grandson has never even seen a soicial worker maybe they think he is in foster care and if thats the case i should recive foster cares allowence thats the job im doing.
